# Edge cases fixture
# Tests boundary conditions and special patterns

# Empty domain pattern (match all)
dns server select 1 10.0.0.1 .

# Wildcard patterns
dns server select 2 10.0.0.1 *.example.com
dns server select 3 10.0.0.1 *.*.corp.local

# Maximum ID value
dns server select 65535 10.0.0.1 .

# Multiple DNS servers (up to 3)
dns server 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 1.1.1.1

# Long domain names
dns static a very-long-hostname-with-many-parts.subdomain.example.com 192.168.1.10
dns server select 100 10.0.0.1 aaaa very.long.subdomain.name.example.com

# PTR with CIDR notation as query pattern
dns server select 200 10.0.0.1 ptr 192.168.0.0/16
dns server select 201 10.0.0.1 ptr 10.0.0.0/8
